text: Adimar Vila Nova Neves (born 28 May 1990), known as Adimar Neves or simply Adimar, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a central defender for Finnish club and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. He also holds Portuguese citizenship. ==International career== Adimar Neves made his international debut on 4 June 2016, when he played entirely in a loss Africa Cup of Nations qualifier against Cape Verde. == References == == External links == * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:Association football central defenders Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe expatriate footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:São Tomé and Príncipe expatriate sportspeople in Finland Category:Expatriate footballers in Finland
title: Adimar Neves
